bibl.title: SH 906 and the Apollo of Simias of Rhodes: Some Issues of (Mis-)attribution.
bibl.note: SH 906 = P. Mich. III, 139 (= M.-P.3 1458; LDAB 3912). Text (including new suggestions by Peter Parsons), translation, and interpretation.

bibl.title: Fakes and Forgers of Classical Literature. Ergo Decipiatur!

bibl.seg: Marco Perale, SH 906 and the Apollo of Simias of Rhodes: Some Issues of (Mis-)attribution.
Javier Martínez (ed.), Fakes and Forgers of Classical Literature. Ergo Decipiatur! = Metaforms. Studies in the Reception of Classical Antiquity. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2014) pp. 207-217, 1 tabl.
